page.title: 13Ravensbourne College of Art.
page.content: The College,which moved from Bromley Common in May 1975,to Waldon Road,is purpose built.It is set in lovely grounds, once part of Waldon Manor.The college seems tucked out of the way but is accessible from all areas and is near a main line station. There are courses in Three-Dimensional Design,Fashion,Graphics,Film and T.V. Engineering and Production,and Technical Illustrations,the last are carried out in an annexe in Wharton Road. Because of financial cuts,the college has dropped its Fine Arts degree course.A "Times" article in 1984 expressed great concern. The College has 557 students,from the area and from all over the country. Courses are quickly filled.Some students live in Hall in Wanstead Rd., others live in lodgings or at home.
